name: Movie Recommendation App
desc: The Movie Recommendation System is an end-to-end Flask-based web app using NLP techniques, offering personalized movie suggestions from a dataset of 4806 films.

name: Gemini App To Retrieve SQL Data
desc: a GENAI model with Google Gemini for efficient healthcare data retrieval using SQL queries.

name: Twitter Sentiment Analysis Using NLTK
desc: A sentiment analysis model leveraging machine learning for Twitter data, enhancing understanding of user sentiments.

name: Prediction for Credit card Approval
desc: Credit Card Approval Prediction project employs streamlined exploratory analysis and data preprocessing, ensuring accurate model evaluation for approval predictions.

name: 911 Calls Analysis & Visualization
desc: Explore and visualize the 911 dataset. It contains emergency call details and location coordinates, enabling statistical analysis and interactive maps.
